title: Mohammed bin Salman - Wikipedia
snippet: Mohammed is the first child of King Salman bin Abdulaziz and his third wife, Fahda bint Falah Al Hithlain. After obtaining a law degree from King Saud University, he became an advisor to his father in 2009. He was appointed deputy crown prince and defense minister after his father became king ...

title: Who is Princess Sara bint Mashour bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, Wife of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud of Saudi Arabia? 3 Facts You Need To Know
snippet: On April 6, 2008 HRH Princess Sara bint Mashour bin Abdulaziz Al Saud married Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud.

title: Sara bint Mashour Al Saud - Wikipedia
snippet: Sara bint Mashour Al Saud (Arabic: سارة بنت مشهور آل سعود) is a member of the Saudi royal family and wife of Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, who is her first cousin. She is a granddaughter of King Abdulaziz. Sara bint Mashour is the daughter of Prince Mashour bin Abdulaziz ...

title: Who is Sara bint Mashour Al Saud? Everything you need to know - Tuko.co.ke
snippet: Sara bint Mashour Al Saud is known to the world as Barbie Princess. She is the wife of Mohammed bin Salman (MBS). Her husband is the de facto ruler of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. He formally served as Crown Prince and Prime Minister.

title: Who is Mohammed bin Salman's Wife? Meet Sara bint Mashoor bin Abdulaziz Al Saud - House of Saud
snippet: In 2008, she married Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, her half cousin, and they had five children together, two daughters and three sons. In 2012, Sara and her family were granted political asylum in the UK, making her the first senior member of the Saudi ruling family to do so.
